text: Mark Stephen SchweikerMark S. Schweiker Papers, 1992â€“2003 . Bloomu.edu. Retrieved 2 June 2011. (born January 31, 1953) is an American businessman and politician. He was the 44th governor of Pennsylvania from October 5, 2001 to January 21, 2003. Schweiker is a Republican. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Lieutenant Governors of Pennsylvania Category:Governors of Pennsylvania Category:Businesspeople from Pennsylvania Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
